scripts.build:vercel: npm run build -w @ahsankhanamu/json-transformer && npm run build -w json-transformer-docs
scripts.build:all: npm run build -w @ahsankhanamu/json-transformer && npm run build -w json-transformer-playground && npm run build -w json-transformer-docs
scripts.build:combined: npm run build -w @ahsankhanamu/json-transformer && npm run build -w json-transformer-docs && cp -r packages/docs/dist/* packages/playground/static/docs/ && npm run build -w json-transformer-playground
scripts.dev:combined: npm run build -w json-transformer-docs && cp -r packages/docs/dist/* packages/playground/static/docs/ && npm run dev -w json-transformer-playground
